jp_name: イルミネーション クラッカー Iruminēshon Kurakkā
description: If someone takes this cracker, the person will glow. And once the user starts glowing, they stay lit up for the entire day.

jp_name: イメージライトキャップ Imēji Raito Kyappu
description: If someone puts the cap on and points it at an incident that is happening at the moment, whatever is happening will change and instead turn into what the user thinks will happen, not what actually would have happened.
appears_in: Suneo is the Ideal Big Brother

jp_name: 人真似ロボット Hitomane Robotto
description: The Imitation Dummy may copy a person's appearance and other aspects on command. It may function as a substitute for that person. Its method of imitation is similar to mimicry, as they tend to be more exaggerated.

jp_name: なげ投げ縄 Nage Nage Nawa
description:
The Infinity Lasso is one of Doraemon's gadgets.
Throw the lasso and it will catch whatever the user wants, the lasso can even make a turn if needed.
appears_in: A Visitor from the Country of the Future/U.S. English dub
Running Away to the Cretaceous Period

jp_name: コンチュー丹 Konchū Tan
description:
It gives the user the power to fly like a butterfly, the power to sting like bees, ants' strength, and a strong body, such as in a hard beetle. It also causes the user to have bug-like behaviors like eating leaves, being afraid of nets and fainting due to bug sprays.
Nobita

jp_name: インスタントチョコメーカー Insutanto Choko Mēkā
description: When an object is placed on the gadget, the gadget produces a chocolate with the shape of the certain object. The chocolate produced by the gadget is delicious.

jp_name: インスタントコピー機 Insutantokopī-ki
description: The sole function of the Instant Copy Machine is to copy another person. Unlike the Copy Robot, it can make multiple copies of one person.

jp_name: インスタントミニチュアサいぞうカメラInsutantominichuasa i zō kamera
description: Snap a picture with this camera, and it will instantly develop a miniature model that looks exactly like what you took a picture of. (Note: This gadget is also as seen in Doraemon & Tamagotchi!)
appears_in: The City of Dreams, Nobita Land

description: The gadget is a machine that has a screen with a pointer, which serves to indicate what object or person the user wants to bring. It also has a platform where the determined object or person will appear when the user presses and "O.K." button. In both of its appearances, it was used to bring back the toys and manga that Gian had confiscated.

jp_name: 即席落とし穴 Sokuseki Otoshiana
description: It is used to create a pitfall, which is basically something like a hole in the ground used for hiding. In the movie Nobita and the Steel Troops, it is used by Doraemon, Nobita, Gian and Suneo to protect themselves from the Steel Troops.
appears_in: Nobita and the Island of Miracles ~Animal Adventure~

jp_name: インスタントツリー, Insutanto Tsurī
description:
The Instant Tree is used for Christmas and can replace a typical Christmas tree. In order to make it function, one must pour hot water on the soil, and it will then start to grow into a Christmas tree.
<tabber>
|-|2005 anime=
Use the cape and cover something and the thing, along with the cape itself, will turn invisible.
appears_in: A Visitor from the Country of the Future
Battle! Cat-Model Robots VS Dog-Model Robots
Shoes to Dance According to the Type of Music
Who is the Mask of Academic?
